doc:
Brad Long (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brad_Long_(actor) 0 Brad Long (June 14, 1962) is a professional speaker and former actor. He is best known for his role in the 1986 film Hoosiers where he played the character of basketball team captain "Buddy" Walker, a role that he saw as much like himself.Long was not without basketball skills. He played college basketball for the Southwestern College Moundbuilders where they were declared the Kansas Collegiate Athletic Conference champions in 1985.
